message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FILENOTFOUND
message.locale: Load Payment Received could not be performed as the file "%1s" does not exist.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_AMOUNT_EMPTY
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the Amount for payment received instrument is not populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_AMOUNT_INVAILD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the Amount for payment received instrument is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_CURRENCYTYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the Currency for payment received instrument is not populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_DEPOSITSLIPNUMBER_INVAILD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the Deposit Slip Number for payment received instrument is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_EFFECTIVEDATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the Effective Date for payment received instrument is not populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_EFFECTIVEDATE_INVAILD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the Effective Date for payment received instrument is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_RECEIPTMETHODTYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the Receipt Method Type for payment received instrument is not populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_RECEIPTNUMBER_INVAILD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the Receipt Number for payment received instrument is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_FV_RECEIVEDDATE_INVAILD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the Received Date for payment received instrument is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_CHEQUENO_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Check do not have check number details populated.
The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Cheque do not have cheque number details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_DESTBANKACCOUNTNAME_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Giro do not have destination bank account name details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_DESTBANKACCOUNTNUMBER_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Giro do not have destination bank account number details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_DESTBANKSORTCODE_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Giro do not have destination bank account sort code details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_DESTIBAN_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Giro do not have destination IBAN details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_DESTBIC_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Giro do not have destination bank account BIC details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_LEDGERNO_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Cash do not have ledger number details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_ORIGINBANKACCOUNTNAME_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Giro do not have originating bank account name details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_ORIGINBANKACCOUNTNUMBER_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Giro do not have originating bank account number details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_ORIGINBANKSORTCODE_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Giro do not have originating bank account sort code details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_ORIGINIBAN_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Giro do not have originating bank account IBAN details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_ORIGINBIC_RECEIPTMETHOD
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as payment received instruments of type Giro do not have originating bank account BIC details populated.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_TOTALAMOUNT_INVALID
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the TotalAmount control total does not equal the total Amount received.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_TOTALCHQAMT_INVALID
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the TotalCheckAmount control total does not equal the total check amount received.
The payment received file cannot be loaded as the TotalCheckAmount control total does not equal the total cheque amount received.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_TOTALCSHAMT_INVALID
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the TotalCashAmount control total does not equal the total cash amount received.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_TOTALRECORDS_INVALID
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the TotalRecords control total does not equal the total number of records in the file.

message.name: ERR_PMTRECEIVEDINSTRUMENT_XFV_TOTALSOAMT_INVALID
message.locale: The payment received file cannot be loaded as the TotalStandingOrderAmount control total does not equal the total standing order amount received.

message.name: INF_LOADPAYMENTRECEIVED_SUB
message.locale: Report from LoadPaymentsReceived batch job run on %1s at %2s.

message.name: INF_PMTRECEIVED_FV_LBYREFNUMBER_INVALID
message.locale: Invalid Liability Reference Number %1s.

message.name: INF_TOTAL_AMOUNT_PMTRECVD_RECS
message.locale: Total amount for all records loaded from the payment received file: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_CASH_AMOUNT_PMTRECVD_RECS
message.locale: Total amount for all Cash payments loaded from the payment received file: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_CHQ_AMOUNT_PMTRECVD_RECS
message.locale: Total amount for all Check payments loaded from the payment received file: %1n
Total amount for all Cheque payments loaded from the payment received file: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_PMTRECVD_RECS
message.locale: Total number of records loaded from the payment received file: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_SO_AMOUNT_PMTRECVD_RECS
message.locale: Total amount for all Standing Order payments loaded from the payment received file: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_SUSPENSEITEMS_CREATED
message.locale: Total number of Suspense Account record(s) created: %1n

message.name: INF_LOAD_PMTS_RECEIVED
message.locale: LoadPmtsRecvd
